instruction.value: Administer daily calculated dose in 4 equally divided doses.
Administer daily calculated dose in 6 equally divided doses.
Administer daily calculated dose in 3 equally divided doses.

Population.value: CHILDREN, 1 year and older AND less than 45 kg in weight.
INFANT, Full-term AND less than 26 weeks of age.
INFANT, Full-term AND greater than 26 weeks, but less than 52 weeks of age.

AdditionalNotes.value: Recommended limit of 400 mg/day for adults over 60 years of age.
